name: Steve D. FERRERO, Appellant, v. WORKERS' COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CH & D ENTERPRISES), Appellee
name_abbreviation: Ferrero v. Workers' Compensation Appeal Board (CH & D Enterprises)

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: Steve D. FERRERO, Appellant, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CH & D ENTERPRISES), Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19 th day of April, 1999, the appeal is dismissed as improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Alexander J. Pentecost, Amiel B. Caramanna, Jr., Elizabeth A. Gebhardt, Pittsburgh, for Steve D. Ferrero.
David Hawkins, Secretary, Amber M. Kenger, Mechanics-burg, for WCAB.
Joseph S. Weimer, Pittsburgh, for CH & D Enterprises.
casebody.head_matter:
726 A.2d 1058
Steve D. FERRERO, Appellant, v. WORKERS’ COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CH & D ENTERPRISES), Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 8, 1999.
Decided April 19, 1999.
Alexander J. Pentecost, Amiel B. Caramanna, Jr., Elizabeth A. Gebhardt, Pittsburgh, for Steve D. Ferrero.
David Hawkins, Secretary, Amber M. Kenger, Mechanics-burg, for WCAB.
Joseph S. Weimer, Pittsburgh, for CH & D Enterprises.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
